segments.text: Observing this kitchen, I note the details carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink, towel in hand over a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet runs steadily, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow cascades over the edge onto the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle expands on the tiled floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, upper cabinets stand open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar sits prominent inside one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy perches on a two-step stool, body extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand delves into the jar, the other clutches a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool legs splay unevenly, suggesting instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl positions nearby, arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above sink frames a serene garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains parted allow daylight to illuminate the room.
segments.speaker: PAR
